files.patch:
@@ -990,2 +990,2 @@
-| `--macos-framework <dir>` (macOs only)           | specify the framework directory include files. Defaults to the current Mac OS X SDK dir.|
-| `-f <framework>` (macOs only)                    | specify the name of the library, path will be expanded to that of the framework folder.|
+| `-F <dir>` (macOs only)                                          | specify the framework directory include files. Defaults to the current Mac OS X SDK dir.|
+| `-framework <framework>` (macOs only)                            | specify the name of the library, path will be expanded to that of the framework folder.|

@@ -1,2 +1,2 @@
-jextract -t opengl -F GLUT \
-  -F OpenGL \
+jextract -t opengl -framework GLUT \
+  -framework OpenGL \

@@ -29,1 +29,1 @@
-f.option.value.invalid=invalid library specifier for -F option: {0}
+framework.option.value.invalid=invalid library specifier for -framework option: {0}
@@ -90,2 +90,2 @@
--framework <dir>            specify the framework directory                                     \n\
--F <framework>                     specify framework library. -F libGL is equivalent to         \n\
+-F <dir>            specify the framework directory                                     \n\
+-framework <framework>                     specify framework library. -framework libGL is equivalent to         \n\
